body.name: Chicco OneFit™ ClearTex® Slim All-in-One Car Seat, Rear-Facing Seat for Infants 5-40 lbs., Forward-Facing Car Seat 25-65 lbs., Booster 40-100 lbs., Convertible Car Seat | Drift/Grey
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 19 hrs 11 mins
features: FOR ALL THE STAGES – From rear-facing harness (5-40 lbs.) to forward-facing harness (25-65 lbs.) to booster (40-100 lbs.), one car seat fits your child, vehicle and life. Includes a removable infant head and body support insert for newborns.

ROOM TO GROW – This convertible car seat boasts extra legroom and the widest range of headrest height adjustment. DuoGuard offers two layers of protection with a steel-reinforced frame and EPS energy-absorbing foam to surround head and torso.
NO ADDED CHEMICALS – ClearTex features no added chemicals and is GREENGUARD Gold Certified for low chemical emissions, contributing to healthier air quality around baby.

SPACE-SAVING DESIGN – This slim car seat takes up less space in the vehicle without compromising comfort. Additionally, two dishwasher-safe CupFolders fold in when not in use, making this all-in-one car seat ideal for travel with multiple children.

EASIEST CAR SEAT TO INSTALL CORRECTLY – Premium LATCH connectors, SuperCinch Force Multiplying LATCH Tightener, RideRight Bubble Level-Indicators and 9-position ReclineSure Leveling System make Chicco car seats the easiest to install correctly – every time.
body.description: The Chicco OneFit ClearTex All-in-One Car Seat fits your child, vehicle and life – from birth through booster. Designed with innovative installation features, OneFit is easy to install as you transition from a rear-facing harness baby car seat (5-40 lbs.) to forward-facing toddler car seat (25-65 lbs.) to harness booster car seat (40-100 lbs.). OneFit ClearTex is GREENGUARD Gold Certified for low chemical emissions, contributing to healthier air quality around your child.Fits Your ChildDesigned for superior child comfort, OneFit provides extra rear-facing legroom and multiple recline options in every mode of use. As a car seat for newborns, OneFit accommodates tiny passengers with a removable head and body support insert for infants weighing 5-11 lbs.DuoGuard offers two layers of protection with a steel-reinforced frame and EPS energy-absorbing foam that surround the head and torso. With the widest range of height adjustments, the 10-position easy-adjust headrest accommodates maximum growth for each mode of use.Fits Your VehicleWith its slim design and space-saving features, this convertible car seat takes up less space in the backseat without compromising comfort for an ideal travel car seat. The two CupFolders conveniently fold in when not in use to maximize space.Innovative installation features like premium LATCH connectors and a SuperCinch Force Multiplying LATCH Tightener make Chicco car seats the easiest to install correctly – every time. RideRight Bubble Level-Indicators and the 9-position ReclineSure Spring-Loaded Leveling Foot provide improved vehicle fit and child comfort. The LockSure Steel-Reinforced Seat Belt Locking System helps to ensure a secure installation using the vehicle seat belt with an easy thread belt path and built-in lock-offs.Fits Your LifeClearTex products meet federal car safety flammability standards without the need of added chemicals. ClearTex extends to all softgoods that surround your child: foam, inserts, comfort kits—even labels. The dishwasher-safe CupFolders make cleaning easy and convenient.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for small car!
reviews.reviewText: I have a small car and I have struggling finding a seat that would fit in the backseat! I did some research and landed on this seat. I am SO HAPPY with this car seat. My baby loves it, it’s so comfortable and soft. The material is wonderful! It’s not too heavy, and install was so easy. I have zero complaints! I will be purchasing a second one for my husbands car/ our backup seat for grandparents. If we are blessed with more children in the future I will absolutely buy this seat again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Car seat seems comfortable and safe very easy to install and perfect for my 26 pound 3.5 year old. Love the recline options as well as the material and stability of the install. If I would have purchased this car seat first I would use it for all 3 of my girls

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very sturdy, very comfy, clearly a high quality unit
reviews.reviewText: This thing weighs a TON, like literally 30 pounds or something. BUT - you could probably strap a kid into a NASCAR racer with this thing and they'd survive a crash (Note - I am joking - do not try this at home).There are multiple well designed and well thought out features for this, including rear facing capability, front facing capability, and conversion to a booster seat. It is extremely well padded, and does in fact remind me of the NASCAR HANSA systems (hence the above silly joke).The written instruction book is confusing and poorly organized. Read the warnings applicable to the child size for which you purchased this seat (that part is pretty well laid out), and then stow the instruction book in the slot in the back that they provide for it. Use the instructions on the right side of the car seat to guide you through the installation process. It's actually pretty simple if you do it that way. The book led me to have a swearing fit.This unit is well engineered and well thought out (except for the instruction manual). I anticipate that this will provide a lot of miles of comfortable, safe riding for your child.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Every car seat we've ordered from Chicco we love, and tried other brands but always come back to Chicco. The super cinch installer is so easy to get the car seat secure in your vehicle. The leveling bubbles are clear and easy to read. This seat in particular was bought for 18 month old, and she is so cozy in there! As well as secure. The harness straps are easy to put on and the pull straps are all very smooth. The material of the car seat is so soft and lush as well as the beautiful lavender color! Very happy with this purchase, it'll last her until she's ready for a booster.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I had my go to brand but being that this was a second car seat to keep with family in another state, I didn’t want to spend an arm and a leg yet I wanted a less toxic option than most car seats on the market. I was happily surprised by the quality and features of this car seat! It is comfortable and feels safe. My daughter loves the cup holders. We like it so much that we plan to switch it out for her other car seat. I especially love that it can be used for years to come and for extended rear facing!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This car seat is the best.. Very sturdy and easy to install in vehicle.. The color is purple color is gorgeous and my grand daughter loves it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great car seat! Prefer the darker colors.
reviews.reviewText: After purchasing this seat in a different color for our younger baby, we enjoyed the ease of installation and the sturdy and safe feeling so much that we decided to replace our toddler’s car seat with this one as well. It is a great car seat. Not too big, but not squishy for a child. We love that it will hopefully last through our kids’ entire childhood. The first time my husband installed it, he GUSHED over how much easier it was compared to our other car seat. The light purple fabric has unfortunately snagged a bit and doesn’t seem as durable as the darker color, although it could just be more noticeable. It also shows dirt easier, which is nearly impossible to avoid with a toddler. It is machine washable though so we aren't too concerned!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best option
reviews.reviewText: This is indeed a great car seat. We got it for our two year old and have already purchase one for our little one.Seems to be very comfortable. Our two year enjoys her naps.It also very well made.
Antes de esta tenía la nextfit pero es recomendada hasta 1 año, encargué esta y me gusto mucho mi bebé va cómodo y cómo está más alta que la anterior a él le encanta ver por la ventana
Excelente silla para mi bebe de 9 meses, se adapro super bien al vehiculo, al tamaño de mi hijo, cuenta con ajuste de posiciones, alturas, etc. Muy recomendable.
La sillla no sirve de un cinturón de seguridad para mi bebé.Lo malo que no guardé la caja
